meanings.definition: Make a pig's characteristic grunting noise.
meanings.sent1: The pig oinked loudly in the barn.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, the pig oinked happily while eating.
meanings.sent3: The pig oinked in delight when it found a juicy apple.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the pig oinking filled the farm with joy.
meanings.sent5: Children giggled as the pig oinked during the petting zoo visit.

meanings.sent1: Last night, the pig oinked all night long.
meanings.sent2: The pig oinked and woke up the entire farm.
meanings.sent3: The pig oinked so much that it couldn't sleep.
meanings.sent4: The farm was quiet after the pig oinked its last oink.
meanings.sent5: The farmer chuckled as he remembered how the pig oinked yesterday.
